LanguageData.LetterFriendlyTrapSprung: {1_labelShort} has accidentally sprung a trap and taken damage from it. (English)
LanguageData.DesignatorRearmTrapDesc: Rearm a sprung trap so it can be triggered again. (English)
LanguageData.CommandRearmDesc: Rearm a sprung trap so it can be triggered again. (English)
LanguageData.CommandAutoRearmDesc: If this is on, this trap will automatically be designated for rearming when it springs. (English)
